Nov. 18, 2017 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
Norris Cultural Arts Center, St. Charles, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Atlantic Brass Band Best featured brass soloist: Bryan Appleby-Wineberg (trumpet, Atlantic Brass Band) Best performance of a march (Roy Newsome Memorial Award): St Louis Brass Band (playing Padstow Lifeboat) Best new composition or arrangement: Doom Impending (Josh Jameson) (played by Dublin Silver Band) Most outstanding percussion section: Atlantic Brass Band
Nov. 13, 2016, 1:48 p.m. Nov. 26, 2017, 11:38 a.m.
1 Atlantic Brass Band Salvatore Scarpa
2 St. Louis Brass Band John Bell
3 Dublin Silver Band Tim Jameson
4 Prairie Brass Band Dallas Niermeyer
5 Milwaukee Festival Brass Mark A. Taylor
